name: Radiate
description:
Trailer | Vimeo Mirror

Official Page: http://etkworks.com/radiate

An oddly specific light sensitive science experiment must navigate its way out of an underground lab while avoiding running into spotlights that glow a different color.

Beware the lights.

_____________________________________

A 20 level 200+ asset game made by a team of college freshman in 48 hours.

http://etkworks.com/

http://etkworks.itch.io/
